docs.text: My Website This is my website . This document is created using Markdown . I created my-website repository on irsbugs account of github In creating i I didn't add any README.md so there were no files in the account. I then went to my laptop where a mkdocs site folder has had git applied. I issued the command: $ git remote add origin https://github.com/irsbugs/my-website.git $ git push -u origin master After this went to my github account and the files and folders from my laptops site folder were in https://github.com/irsbugs/my-website/... In github Settins I set the Github Pages source to be master branch. I was then able to use my laptops browser to go to https://irsbugs.github.io/my-website/index.html and the web-site was available. For some reason https://irsbugs.github.io/my-website/ would give a 404 error but it was OK with the index.html appended to it. Updating Example of updating after editing index.md Update mkdocs and check in local browser (venv7) ian@X200:~/my-website$ mkdocs build --clean && mkdocs serve INFO - Cleaning site directory INFO - Building documentation to directory: /home/ian/my-website/site INFO - Building documentation... INFO - Cleaning site directory [I 190828 07:25:24 server:296] Serving on http://127.0.0.1:8000 [I 190828 07:25:24 handlers:62] Start watching changes Now commit the updates in site folder (venv7) ian@X200:~/my-website$ cd site (venv7) ian@X200:~/my-website/site$ git commit -a -m "updates to index.md" 4 files changed, 14 insertions(+), 4 deletions(-) (venv7) ian@X200:~/my-website/site$ Note: If you leave out the -m "message" then a session of nano will open to prompt you to add the message. Now push the changes on the laptop to github (venv7) ian@X200:~/my-website/site$ git push -u origin master Username for 'https://github.com': irsbugs Password for 'https://irsbugs@github.com': Counting objects: 7, done. Delta compression using up to 2 threads. Compressing objects: 100% (7/7), done. Writing objects: 100% (7/7), 1.65 KiB | 1.65 MiB/s, done. Total 7 (delta 4), reused 0 (delta 0) remote: Resolving deltas: 100% (4/4), completed with 4 local objects. To https://github.com/irsbugs/my-website.git 4784b0f..dcf52a7 master -> master Branch 'master' set up to track remote branch 'master' from 'origin'.
